entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 01:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
